thread.title: Here's how you can watch Cardinals-Cubs Game 4
thread.title_full: Here's how you can watch Cardinals-Cubs Game 4 | Las Vegas Review-Journal

author: reviewjournal.com
title: Here's how you can watch Cardinals-Cubs Game 4
text:
The National League Division Series between the St. Louis Cardinals and the Chicago Cubs continues today at Wrigley Field in Chicago.
The Cubs lead the series 2-1 after beating the Cardinals 8-6 in Game 3 Monday night.
Here's what you need to know to catch the game.
Time: 1:37 p.m. PDT
TV: TBS (DirecTV 247, Cox 7, Century Link 113, Dish 139)
Online: MLB.com (subscription required)
Schedule for Game 5 (if necessary): Cubs at Cardinals — Thursday, Oct. 15, 1:37 p.m. — TBS
Texas governor prematurely... Pittsburgh officer under...
